item.name: Wristblades
entries: Retractable blades mounted on gauntlets worn by Predators. These weapons are considered part of the wearer and cannot be disarmed. They can be extended or retracted as a free action.

item.name: Plasma Caster
entries: A shoulder-mounted energy weapon that fires superheated plasma bolts. The weapon is controlled by the wearer's Bio-Mask targeting system and can fire without the use of hands. It has 20 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Bio-Mask
entries: This advanced helmet provides multiple vision modes and life support. While wearing this mask, you gain the following benefits:

items: You can breathe normally in any environment that has air.
You have darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.
You can switch between normal vision and thermal vision as a bonus action.
You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet.
The mask translates languages, allowing you to understand (but not speak) any spoken language.

item.name: Predator Cloak
entries: This advanced cloaking device renders the wearer nearly invisible. While wearing this cloak, you can use an action to cast {@spell invisibility} on yourself. The cloak has 3 charges and regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.

item.name: Self-Healing Module
entries: This medical device can rapidly heal wounds. As a bonus action, you can activate the module to regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your Constitution modifier. The module has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Spear Trap
entries: A mechanical trap that launches a spear when triggered. Setting the trap takes 1 minute and requires a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. When a creature steps on the trigger (a 5-foot square), they must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 piercing damage.

item.name: Net Trap
entries: A trap that deploys a weighted net when triggered. Setting the trap takes 1 minute and requires a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. When triggered, creatures in a 10-foot square must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by the net. A creature can use its action to make a DC 15 Strength check to free itself or another creature.

item.name: Snare Trap
entries: A simple rope snare that catches creatures by the leg. Setting the trap takes 1 minute and requires a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. When triggered, the creature must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained and lifted 5 feet off the ground. A creature can use its action to make a DC 15 Strength check to free itself.

item.name: Shock Dart
entries: A small dart that delivers an electric shock on impact. On a hit, the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn. Each dart can only be used once.

item.name: Portable Mine
entries: A small explosive device that can be placed and remotely detonated. Setting the mine takes an action, and it can be detonated as a bonus action if you are within 120 feet. When detonated, all creatures within 10 feet must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
